sch:pattern.name: UBLExtensions
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the UBLExtensions class

sch:pattern.name: Profile
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating root element, Profile and UBL version

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-CIU001] Root element must be CatalogueItemSpecificationUpdate
[F-CIU249] The documenttype does not match an OIOUBL CatalogueItemSpecificationUpdate and can not be validated by this schematron.

sch:pattern.name: CatalogueItemSpecificationUpdate
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the CatalogueItemSpecificationUpdate structure

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-CIU004] LineCountNumeric element must be excluded
[F-CIU003] Invalid VersionID. Must contain a value
[F-CIU005] One SellerSupplierParty class must be present
[F-CIU002] Invalid ID. Must contain a value
sch:rule.sch:report: [F-CIU006] ContractorCustomerParty must be different from ReceiverParty
[F-CIU007] No more than one ValidityPeriod class must be present

sch:pattern.name: ValidityPeriod
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the ValidityPeriod class

sch:pattern.name: RelatedCatalogueReference
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the DeletedCatalogueReference class

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-CIU242] Invalid ID. Must contain a value

sch:pattern.name: ReferencedContract
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the ReferencedContract class

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-CIU020] Invalid ID. Must contain a value
sch:rule.sch:report: [F-CIU022] No more than one ContractDocumentReference class may be present

sch:pattern.name: Signature
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the Signature class

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-CIU030] Invalid ID. Must contain a value

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-CIU031] No more than one PartyLegalEntity class may be present

sch:pattern.name: ProviderParty
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the ProviderParty class

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-CIU040] Invalid EndpointID. Must contain a value
[F-CIU041] One PartyLegalEntity class must be present

sch:pattern.name: ReceiverParty
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the ReceiverParty class

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-CIU050] Invalid EndpointID. Must contain a value
sch:rule.sch:report: [F-CIU051] No more than one PartyLegalEntity class may be present

sch:pattern.name: SellerSupplierParty
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the SellerSupplierParty class

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-CIU060] DataSendingCapability element must be excluded
[F-CIU061] One Party class must be present

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-CIU062] No more than one PartyLegalEntity class may be present

sch:pattern.name: ContractorCustomerParty
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the ContractorCustomerParty class

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-CIU070] Party class must be present

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-CIU071] No more than one PartyLegalEntity class may be present

sch:pattern.name: TradingTerms
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the TradingTerms class

sch:pattern.name: DefaultLanguage
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the DefaultLanguage class

sch:pattern.name: CatalogueItemSpecificationUpdateLine
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the CatalogueItemSpecificationUpdateLine class

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-CIU100] Invalid ID. Must contain a value
sch:rule.sch:report: [F-CIU111] ID must be unique within the document instance

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-CIU120] Party class must be present

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-CIU121] No more than one PartyLegalEntity class may be present

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-CIU130] DataSendingCapability element must be excluded
[F-CIU131] Party class must be present

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-CIU132] No more than one PartyLegalEntity class may be present

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-CIU220] CatalogueIndicator element must be excluded
[F-CIU241] OriginCountry class must be excluded
[F-CIU234] ClassifiedTaxCategory class must be excluded
[F-CIU221] Invalid Name. Must contain a value
[F-CIU223] One SellersItemIdentification class must be present
[F-CIU230] At least one CommodityClassification class must be present
sch:rule.sch:report: [F-CIU228] No more than one ManufacturersItemIdentification class may be present
[F-CIU229] No more than one AdditionalItemIdentification class may be present
[F-CIU243] No more than one OriginAddress class may be present

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-CIU224] Invalid ID. Must contain a value
[F-CIU244] PositionCode element must be excluded
[F-CIU245] DescriptionCode element must be excluded
[F-CIU226] Invalid Description. Must contain a value
[F-CIU225] Invalid AttributeID. Must contain a value
[F-CIU227] Invalid AttributeID. Must contain a value
[F-CIU231] Invalid ItemClassificationCode. Must contain a value
[F-CIU232] Invalid listID. Must be 'UNSPSC'
[F-CIU233] Invalid listAgencyID. Must be '113'
[F-CIU235] Invalid Name. Must contain a value
[F-CIU236] Invalid Value. Must contain a value
[F-CIU237] Invalid ID. Must contain a value
[F-CIU246] Invalid Name. Must contain a value
[F-CIU247] Invalid Value. Must contain a value
[F-CIU248] Invalid ID. Must contain a value
[F-CIU238] Invalid Name. Must contain a value
[F-CIU239] Invalid Value. Must contain a value
[F-CIU240] Invalid ID. Must contain a value
